name: Healthyfied No Mayo Coleslaw
description: This Healthyfied No Mayo Coleslaw is a delicious, low-carb alternative to traditional coleslaw, perfect for those following a healthier lifestyle. Packed with fresh cabbage, red peppers, and a tangy lemon juice dressing, it's a refreshing side dish for any meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables: Chop the cabbage and dice the red pepper. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the Greek live yogurt, salt, lemon juice, ground pepper, and coconut sugar. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped cabbage, diced red pepper, and sliced black olives to the bowl with the dressing. Toss until the vegetables are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Let the coleslaw sit for at least 30 minutes in the fridge to allow the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
